ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie Bard needs hunting suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... OK, but what kind of improvement did you see when you got the new PC?  And what are the stats on the new PC...err, specs that is, if you don t mind my
ygData.messageBody:
> Before I recently got a new machine I was using a PII 233
> with 128 meg and a
> 28000 modem. The only zones that were unhuntable were Unrest
> and near the
> Aviak City in SK (and Kunark before I lowered my clipping to
> about1/3). 128
> makes alll the difference :o)
>
> Tszaaz

OK, but what kind of improvement did you see when you got the new PC? And
what are the stats on the new PC...err, specs that is, if you don't mind my
asking.

Peace
Evulia, probably 3 months away from being able to afford a new PC
